name: Childcare Referral Service
description: By advocating for quality early care and education, empowering families with information and financial support, and building the capabilities of educators, we ensure that every child in San Francisco has the opportunity to reach their full potential. We offer a variety of services to support your child care search: - Support in finding child care that meets your needs and securing financial assistance to pay for it. Click here to learn about how we will be by your side every step of the way. - I

whatTheyOffer: By advocating for quality early care and education, empowering families with information and financial support, and building the capabilities of educators, we ensure that every child in San Francisco has the opportunity to reach their full potential. We offer a variety of services to support your child care search: - Support in finding child care that meets your needs and securing financial assistance to pay for it. Click here to learn about how we will be by your side every step of the way. - I
howToGetIt: There are several ways to get one-on-one guidance matching child care programs with your needs: - Drop by our office at 445 Church Street (Counselors available Mon-Fri 8:30am-5pm) - Call 415.343.3300 - Send us an email You may also search their database of over 900 licensed child care programs in San Francisco. Click here to use our Mobile-Friendly Child Care Finder: https://www.childrenscouncil.org/families/find-child-care/child-care-referrals/child-care-search/
